name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior AI Engineer with 8 years of experience specializing in **Python**, **Node.js**, **AWS**, **Azure**, and leveraging **GCP** for high-performance AI solutions. Proficient in developing and deploying AI/ML models using **TensorFlow** and **PyTorch**, with hands-on experience in creating robust **APIs** for seamless integration. I have a proven track record in building enterprise-grade platforms that utilize modern JavaScript/TypeScript technologies while ensuring compliance with industry standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.
My expertise includes developing machine learning pipelines, implementing MLOps workflows with tools like MLflow, Airflow, and Kubeflow, and integrating intelligent automation into existing systems. I thrive in fast-paced environments and am committed to delivering high-quality, secure applications that meet business objectives.
